text: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مُتَبَّرٌ مَّا هُمْ فِيهِ وَبَـٰطِلٌ مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, those [worshippers] - destroyed is that in which they are [engaged], and worthless is whatever they were doing."
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya mereka itu akan dihancurkan kepercayaan yang dianutnya dan akan batal apa yang seIalu mereka kerjakan.
